column6:
Planet Earth. Inhabited by six billion people. People leading ordinary lives, coping with everyday struggles. But on a night like any other, the Earth is rocked by the most startling celestial event ever witnessed by the human race. The White Event. And from its wake, a handful of humans emerge as something more. ,2006,12
Acclaimed writer Warren Ellis (NEXTWAVE) and superstar artist Salvador Larroca (X-MEN) bring you this new universe -
a universe witnessing superhuman power for the first time.
32 PGS./Rated T+ ...$2.99
column8: | writer:Warren Ellis | colorist:Jason Keith | penciller (cover):Salvador Larroca | letterer:Rus Wooton
